Bilingual Bookkeeping Assistant job details include: Shift: Monday-Friday, 8:30 A.M. - 5:00 P.M., with starting pay of $22 per hour. Be in charge of matching invoices to work orders, depositing reconciliations, contacting customers to collect payments, and maintaining accurate accounting records. You will reconcile bank statements, process new customer credit applications, and follow up on credit references. Additionally, you will be tasked with recording business transactions, collecting company credit card expenses, researching track, and resolving accounting issues. Qualifications: Bilingual in English and Mandarin. Bachelor's degree preferred. 2-3 years of previous meaningful finance and inventory experience. Excellent communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills. Knowledge of Microsoft applications (Word, Excel, and Outlook). Let's grow together and reach new heights.
